CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Override ** The Capacity is used to restrict Attendees from registering once the threshold has been met if "Enable Waitlisting" is checked. Derives automatically from the "Capacity" of the related Room.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Override ** The Capacity is used to restrict Attendees from registering once the threshold has been met if "Enable Waitlisting" is checked. Derives automatically from the "Capacity" of the related Room.
CustomField.label: Capacity
